(1)
.Forest Avenue, south side, between Simonson and Van Name Avenues, showing the stone quarry on the M. S. Marshall estate.
April 16, 1910
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr

(2)
Another view, years later.
About May 1, 1927
P. L. Sperr

107 Forest Avenue (formerly Washington Avenue), north side, 100 feet east of Simonson Avenue, showing an old stone house; the rear of the house is wooden. The dwelling belonged to Captain A. Simonson in 1874 (Beers's map). Succeeding maps from 1898 to 1917 show it to have been on the estate of Mary Morrison.

P. L. Sperr
February 1925
